item.title: Unified Observability Stack with .NET ILogger, Elastic, and Sentry
item.description: Goal Route logs from ILogger<T> to multiple sinks (Console, Elasticsearch, Sentry, Elastic APM) for comprehensive observability across development and production environments. Unified Logging Interface ILogger<T> routes logs to all configured sinks based on log levels, filters, and environment: _logger.LogWarning("Something might be wrong here"); This single call outputs to: Console (dev environments) Elasticsearch (structured, queryable) Sentry (errors meeting severity threshold) Sink Configuration Sink Captures Triggered By Key Value Console Logs All levels (e.
